patch:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@ FROM anapsix/alpine-java:8u201b09_jdk_unlimited
 WORKDIR /app
 COPY . /app
 
-RUN crontab -l | { cat; echo "1 8 * * * java -jar /app/BilibiliTask-1.0.9-all.jar >> /var/log/bilibili_task.log 2>&1"; } | crontab -
+RUN crontab -l | { cat; echo "40 10 * * * java -jar /app/BilibiliTask-1.0.9-all.jar >> /var/log/bilibili_task.log 2>&1"; } | crontab -
 RUN touch /var/log/bilibili_task.log
 
 RUN sh gradlew clean build
